title: "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
body: what can i do with that ????

replies.body:
You can check to see if your connection settings are compatible with League by going through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). These issues are often caused by settings that results in a poor connection to our servers, which can prevent you joining matches, disconnect from them, or even stop patching from happening.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
